title: Installation issue: visit due to QVTKWidget2.h not found
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install visit %gcc@5.4.0 ^netcdf~mpi ^hdf5~mpi ^silo~mpi ^vtk+osmesa
...
/lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/visit-2.13.0-v7didksquzqz43eapa5d3jecgerovkc4/visit2.13.0/src/vtkqt/vtkQtRenderWindow.C:6:27: fatal error: QVTKWidget2.h: No such file
 or directory
compilation terminated.[2]: *** [vtkqt/CMakeFiles/vtkqt.dir/vtkQtRenderWindow.C.o] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/visit-2.13.0-v7didksquzqz43eapa5d3jecgerovkc4/visit2.13.0/spack-build'
make[1]: *** [vtkqt/CMakeFiles/vtkqt.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux mu04.pi.sjtu.edu.cn 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 22 16:42:41 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information
